TopicTitle: What can I do with Access 2013?

Articles.Content:
I recently bought Office 365 for students, I'm so happy that finally I was able to activate the son of a *****, that is about all the programs including the latest versions of Access, I just wonder how can I use it in my thesis.

I had one semester at the undergraduate, everyone had to do relational bibliographic database on a chosen topic, I chose the Air Force during World War II.

I for my database, I got 4 (B in American and British grading system)
